Articles.Content:
Just took a nice picture on KSP... Uploaded it to 100x100, but still not working. Does it take a lot of time to function? It might be a dumb post... But I dont like being in a forum without a prof pic <3:P

- - - Updated - - -

Nope... Nevermind... Its working now... Took a while to realize I had to upload as an Avatar. Srry folks, noob here.

Is it less than 64 KB in size? There is also that limit on the forums.

UPDATE:

See you got it working. Great!
